name: Noxious Thorn
desc: Gain 10% chance to bleed an enemy. On killing an enemy, transfer 33% of every debuff stack to 1 enemy (+1 per stack) within 20m (+5m per stack) .
notes:
Noxious Thorn is an item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Seekers of the Storm expansion.
The first stack of Noxious Thorn grants a 10% chance to inflict enemies with   Bleed on hit. On kill, 33% of the killed enemy's debuff stacks are transferred to 1 living enemy (+1 per stack) within 20 meters (+5 meters per stack) of where it was killed.


== Notes ==
This item and  Tri-Tip Dagger both contribute towards the same chance to apply bleed on-hit, and do not roll independently of each other.
The amount of debuffs transferred is rounded up. For example, if a killed enemy had less than 3 stacks of a given debuff, 1 stack of the debuff will still be transferred anyway.
It transfers stacks of the following debuffs:
  Bleed
  Collapse
  Hemorrhage
  Burn
  Stronger Burn
  Poison
  Blight
  Fruiting
  Weak
  Expose
  Lunar Ruin
  Beetle Juice
  Overheat
  Healing Disabled
  Cripple
  Pulverize Buildup
  Pulverized
  Permanent Armor Reduction
  Nullify Stack
  Nullified
  50% Slow
  60% Slow
  80% Slow
  Tar
  Death Mark
The following debuffs cannot be transferred:
  Entangle
  Ruin
  Lunar Root
  Permanent Curse
  Helfire
  Void Fog
  Void Fog Strong
  Breaching Fin Debuff
  Disable All Skills
  Soul Cost

A limping Beetle approaches, it’s stump leg crunches onto thorns hidden by ichor and it shrieks, convulsing. Campbell screams and fires but her pistol jams with ichor. The Beetle shudders and it’s many small wounds open and turn to sickly, yellow rivers.
